job.title: MuleSoft Developer $150k+
job.description: If you are a MuleSoft Developer with experience, please read on!Top Reasons to Work with Us Great Salary Great Benefits In a stable but growing company in the heart of Chicago!What You Will Be DoingIntegration DevelopmentWhat You Need for this PositionMore Than 5 Years Of Experience And Knowledge Of MuleSoft IntegrationWhat's In It for You Vacation/PTO Medical Dental Vision Relocation Bonus 401kSo, if you are a MuleSoft Developer with experience, please apply today!Email Your Resume In Word ToLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:Jim.Luce@CyberCoders.comPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : JL3-1639562 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***Jim Luce - Recruiting Manager - CyberCodersApplicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
